ComicInfo.Summary:
With the loss of his parents still a fresh wound in his soul, Modi sets off to claim revenge on the Gods. Along the way, he's gong to face corrupt Valkyries, dragons, witches, and undead soldiers. Living in the age of Beowulf was no walk in the park! For Modi, this is his test. If he can overcome these barriers to his revenge, then he will know that even gods might learn to feat him. And if that's not enough, get ready for Modi's hand-to-hand battle with the sexy Valkyrie known as Skogul! This solid, high-energy fun from the artist and co-creator of Powers even offers an important life lesson: walk softly and carry a big rock!
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/hammer-of-the-gods-2-entrance-to-valhalla/4000-328858/
ComicInfo.Title: Entrance to Valhalla
